sourcesContent: import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { Flex, Box, Spacer, Link, Img, Button, IconButton } from "@chakra-ui/react"; import logo from "../assets/logo.png"; import "../styles/NavBar.css"; import { HamburgerIcon, CloseIcon } from '@chakra-ui/icons' const NavBar = () => { const [display, changeDisplay] = useState('none'); const contact = "https://wa.me/6281215267243"; return( <> {/* Desktop */} Home About FAQ Contact {/* Mobile */} } onClick={() => changeDisplay('flex')} display={['flex', 'flex', 'none', 'none']}> {/* Mobile Content */} } onClick={() => changeDisplay('none')}/> ) }; export default NavBar;
